name: Ice Ice Baby (agirlcea, JPuertovannetti)
description:
DESCRIPTION

IceIceBaby is a fun, fast, slippery game that will give the player non-stop action! Hop around avoiding obstacles while cashing in on some fish!

CONTROLS / INSTRUCTIONS

FEATURES

The gameplay level will feature one ice rink level. 
All objects that interact with the ice rink will be low friction:

  • Player
  • Fish
  • Spiky block

Fish and Spiky Blocks will fall from the sky:

  • At random locations to the playing area below
  • At fixed time intervals 

Player Mechanics:

  • Hop (jump)
  • Waddle (walk)

TEAM CREDITS - TEAM WADDLE PARTY


Teyanna Calabrese: Project Manager, 3D Environment Art, 3D Art Assets, 2D UI + UX Art, Level Design (https://agirlcea.itch.io)

Jorge Puertovannetti: Project Manager, Gameplay + UI Programming, Audio Design (https://jpuertovannetti.itch.io)
